[HFC Partial Owner, Gregg Garner, and wife Tara Have Charges Against them Dismissed; Records to be Expunged](/articles/2022/9/1/hfc-partial-owner-gregg-garner-and-wife-tara-have-charges-against-them-dismissed-records-to-be-expunged) The Office of the Attorney General has dropped all charges of TennCare Fraud and Theft of Services against Tara and Gregg Garner, founding co-owner of Hopewell Family Care
